original_text:
But they did not find any, though many false witnesses came forward.
Finally two came forward
korean_text: 거짓 증인이 많이 왔으나 얻지 못하더니 후에 두 사람이 와서

sentences.original_text: But they did not find any
though many false witnesses came forward
sentences.korean_translation: 비록 많은 거짓 증인들이 나아왔음에도 불구하고
